title: Origami Book : How to Make a Mini Origami Book for Kids | Kids Crafts Easy Origami

json.text: Welcome to StylEnrich Kids Craft Channel!
How to Make a Mini Origami Book for kids.
Use this paper origami book as a gift  for your friends. You can also gift it to your loved one on valentines day.
Things You Need...
Color Papers, Handmade Paper, Pencil, Scissor, Adhesive, Scale
Take a color paper and measure 20*20 cm on it using scale.
Cut out a square piece from this measurement.
Using the same measurement we need 5 papers, 4 colored paper to make the pages of the book and 1 handmade paper to make the cover page of the book.
Take a colored sheet and fold it into two equal halves. Cut along the folded portion.
Repeat the same process with all the colored sheets.
Now take the cut out colored sheet and fold it as shown.
Repeat the same process with the remaining colored sheets.
Now take one folded sheet and insert another sheet into it through the opening of the first sheet as shown.
Continue the same process with the remaining sheets as well.
Now paste the papers together at the connecting point in the long strip.
Now open the long strip and apply glue all over. Press and join the sheets together to give it the look of a page.
Take the handmade sheet and fold it into equal halves just like the colored sheet. Cut along the folded portion.
Now take one sheet and fold the paper little inwards as shown.
Take the colored paper pages and place it inside the handmade sheet as shown. Mark the center and width of the book using a pencil.
Fold the extra handmade sheet inwards. Now adjust the pages of the book and fix the cover accordingly.
Apply glue on the first and last page of the book and paste the handmade paper to it so that it holds the pages firmly.
Your Mini Origami Book is now ready for use
Hope you have enjoyed making a book for your kid.
Kids are definitely going to love this decorative mini book. You can also gift it to your partner as a Valentines Day gift.
Thanks for watching and Happy Crafting!!
